entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
